mapper.sql: /*[TbbsCtegryDtl.xml][select][TANINE]*/ SELECT CTEGRY_MST_CD , CTEGRY_DTL_CD , CTEGRY_DTL_NM , REF_VAL1 , REF_VAL2 , REF_VAL3 , SRT_SEQ , US_YN , CRTR_ID , CRT_DTTM , UPDR_ID , UPD_DTTM FROM TBBS_CTEGRY_DTL WHERE CTEGRY_DTL_CD = #{ctegry_dtl_cd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND CTEGRY_MST_CD = #{ctegry_mst_cd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: /* [TbbsCtegryDtl.xml][getTbbsCtegryDtlCDCnt][금칙어 cd 값 조회][TANINE] */ SELECT MAX(CD)+1 AS CD FROM TBBS_CTEGRY_DTL WHERE CTEGRY_DTL_CD='BTXT'

/* [TbbsCtegryDtl.xml][selectTbbsCtegryDtlMultiList][코드 상세 리스트 조회(MST_CD 복수 조회)][TANINE] */ SELECT CM.CTEGRY_MST_CD -- 마스터코드 ,CD.CTEGRY_DTL_CD -- 상세코드 ,CD.CTEGRY_DTL_NM -- 상세코드명 ,CD.REF_VAL1 -- 참조값1 ,CD.REF_VAL2 -- 참조값2 ,CD.REF_VAL3 -- 참조값3 ,CD.SRT_SEQ -- 사이트번호 ,CD.US_YN -- 사용여부 ,CD.CRTR_ID -- 등록자아이디 ,CD.CRT_DTTM -- 등록일시 ,CD.UPDR_ID -- 수정자아이디 ,CD.UPD_DTTM -- 수정일시 FROM TBBS_CTEGRY_DTL CD , TBBS_CTEGRY_MST CM WHERE CD.CTEGRY_MST_CD = CM.CTEGRY_MST_CD AND CM.US_YN = 'Y' AND CD.US_YN = 'Y' AND CD.CTEGRY_MST_CD IN #{list.CTEGRY_MST_CD}
ORDER BY CD.CTEGRY_MST_CD

/*[TbbsCtegryDtl.xml][selectTcmnCdDtlCnt][상세코드 수][TANINE]*/ SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TBBS_CTEGRY_DTL WHERE CTEGRY_MST_CD = upper(#{ctegry_mst_cd ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND CTEGRY_DTL_CD = upper(#{ctegry_dtl_nm ,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
